  • public class StationEnemy
extends Enemy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StationEnemy()
      Creates a default StationEnemy object with a Gun
      StationEnemy(int damage, double x, double y, int fireRate, int maxHealth)
      Creates a custom StationEnemy object with a Gun, specific velocity at location x,y

    • Constructor Detail

      • StationEnemy

        public StationEnemy()
        Creates a default StationEnemy object with a Gun

      • StationEnemy

        public StationEnemy(int damage,
                    double x,
                    double y,
                    int fireRate,
                    int maxHealth)
        Creates a custom StationEnemy object with a Gun, specific velocity at location x,y
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of this enemy
        y - the x coordinate of this enemy
        fireRate - the Gun Fire rate of this Enemy
        maxHealth - the health of this Enemy
        damage - the damage dealt by this StationEnemy

    • Method Detail

      • fireNearPlayer

        public void fireNearPlayer(Player p,
                           int millis,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Structure> structures)
        Fires a bullet to the location of player
        Parameters:
        p - the player object this StationEnemy has to shoot/target
        millis - the number of milliseconds until the StationEnemy shoots again
        structures - the list of structures in the Room

      • getGun

        public Gun getGun()
        Returns the Gun this enemy is holding
        Returns:
        the Gun object that belongs to this enemy

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer,
                 processing.core.PImage eDown)
        Draws a graphical representation of this StationEnemy at its respective location by checking the StationEnemy's current direction
        Parameters:
        eDown - the image of this StationEnemy facing front
        drawer - the PApplet that draws a representation of this StationEnemy
